sys_ux_client_script.name: filter

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_aa7fdb30473fb11008334d05516d4385
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home">7d7643b44ebbb110bb520b8da6bfcb06</macroponent><name>filter</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function applyFilter ({ api, event, imports }) {
	api.setState('parFilters', ({ currentValue }) => {
		const { payload: { appliedFilters } } = event;
		return imports['global.mergePARFilters']()(currentValue, appliedFilters);
	});
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-15 18:23:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>aa7fdb30473fb11008334d05516d4385</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>filter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Solicitação de Crédito" source="x_1174267_solici_0">20d0b15f4727311008334d05516d430e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Solicitação de Crédito">20d0b15f4727311008334d05516d430e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_aa7fdb30473fb11008334d05516d4385</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-15 18:36:45</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
